chara.textHome: My name is Ria Ami.

As you can see,
I am blessed with good looks...
That's why I'm so popular in all industries...

So if you want me to appear in one
of your promotions please give
me the details well ahead of time.
Hm? Was I this beautiful even as a child?
Ha ha...um, o-of course I was!

Here marks the birth of Ria Ami,
highest-ranking Magical Girl!

Feel free to worship me to
your heart's content, everyone!
My beauty knows no bounds...
Oh, it gives me shivers!

These results reveal that I,
Ria Ami, am a goddess of beauty!
I see it now!
Oh, clear as day!

A future where supermodels, famous
actresses, everyone is so envious of my
beauty they'll gnaw on their handkerchiefs!

I may have triumphed...
but my tireless work on my
beauty is never over.

For I work hard to make my dreams
come true...and that's where
my true beauty is!
You certainly kept me waiting.
At least it gave me time to get a massage...
Now my muscles feel like jelly.
Good morning to you.

No, you won't be seeing my 
gorgeous face yawning.

Fresh out of bed or not,
my beauty never changes.
Ugh, I'm famished! Wasting away!

Times like this call for one thing
and one thing only:
a mega-huge serving of rice omelet!
Now, to Walnuts at once!

My schedule is crammed full of
appointments with editors today.

Therefore, I don't have time for
idle chit-chat.
Late nights are the nemesis of silky skin.

I must turn in and retire before
my own suffers
If you need to talk, make it quick.
Beauty is a culmination of little details.

Tense your abdomen and you will
glide elegantly when you walk.
Now, try it yourself!
What's this? You're still not ready to depart?

A beautiful girl like me will be joining you on
this venture, so would you please hurry?
Challenging me to battle, are you?
You have guts, I'll give you that.
Though, I already know how this will end.
Now, shall we?

It seems as though you've failed to
recognize my superiority.

Would you please take your jokes out
with the rest of the trash?!

Well, I never! Don't you think that's a
few too many compliments?
That said, I certainly feel that way too!

That dress. Yes, it's very cute,
but possibly a little too much so?
Perhaps if I were just slightly younger...
Eat when it's time and endure when it's not.
That is the core of Ria Ami-style dieting.
You should always keep that in mind.

Manaka's about the only person ever who'd
come to me asking for meaningless favors.

That brazenness of hers...
I wish I had at least some of it.
Yachiyo?!

You wouldn't be referring to
Yachiyo Nanami, would you?!

Not another word!
Never mention that woman again!

My greatest wish is to become a
supermodel who can exemplify
any outfit she wears.

But I beg of you.
Nothing designed by Kanoko, please...
You said Kako and Konomi, correct?
How I adore modest girls like them.

Never once do they disturb the
natural order of things.

What was my wish to become a
Magical Girl?
What a trifling question!

If I'm happy now that's what matters most.
I live for the present!
With elegance, with glamour!
We fought beautifully!
My magnificent magnetism!
As in beauty, perfection!!!
More fans have flocked to me, no?

I am Ria Ami, a goddess of grace and
poise who descended to Earth!

...Hey! Not that I'm not used to it,
but you mustn't stare at me so intensely!
Wonderful! Now more!

Let's keep moving ever
more beautifully forward!
I'm the best, you said?
The best?!

Ohhh, I'm delighted!
I LOVE being the best!

Well! I'm gorgeous enough
to make anyone's eyes widen!

Strength, elegance, and beauty;
such is my predestined path...

As long as others need me,
I'll gladly continue down that road!
Fantastic!

I've conquered the realm of beauty,
so next up is the realm of Magical Girls!
I have to get my name out among them, too!
